6. Remain seized of the matter.
The Chambers shall have a maximum of 16 permanent independent judges and 9 ad litem independent judges. No two judges can be nationals of the same State. Each Trial Chamber will have 3 permanent and 6 ad litem judges. Ad litem judges can be part of sections of 3 judges within a Trial Chamber, with the same powers as a full Trial Chamber, and can render judgements according to the same rules.
